title: Vane's Gambit
goal: Show the antagonist's master plan taking shape.
stakes_shift: The city of Aethelgard is being sacrificed to power Vane's ritual.

scenes.summary: Vane walks into the Council chambers, no longer hiding.
scenes.outcome: Vane kills the head of the Council and takes control.

scenes.summary: Vane activates the 'Void-Siphon' beneath the city.
scenes.outcome: The city's life force begins to drain.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Lyra witness the citizens falling into a catatonic state.
scenes.outcome: They realize they can't just leave; they have to stop the siphon.

scenes.summary: They are cornered by a mob of the 'Falling Sickness' victims, now turned into mindless thralls.
scenes.outcome: They fight their way to the city's central spire.

scenes.summary: Astra tells Kaelen he can use the shard to save the people, but it will deplete the energy needed to save the stars.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen chooses to save the people, delaying their ultimate goal.

scenes.summary: The shard's light pulses, breaking the siphon locally.
scenes.outcome: Thousands are saved, but Vane now knows exactly where they are.
